TopicTitle: It's possible make a cutscene in KSP?

Articles.Content: Like... Using videos, or something, it's possible?

... I've not seen this asked for before, but given that we music will start on atmospheric exit, and mods that will take photos at significant events, I'm sure it is possible - even if it a pause in the game with a flyby from the object you have entered into the SOI of to the ship, though the 'windows' of a POD to a portrait of the Kerbal smiling, or something similar when landing on a body... why not!

Peace.
Thinking hypothetically, if someone created a "addon" that had a wormhole and had an animation like Interstellar(the movie) and go to the other side, WOULD BE AWESOME.
